comment: Can be a tough grader at times. Also, it is important that you make no grammatical or spelling errors; she will make a fool of you in front if the entire class if you do.
All I can say is WOW.  She is such a great teacher and she know every thing there is to know about teaching reading.  I really learned so much this semester from her.

She is a brilliant teacher! I will be a better teacher for having learned from her.  Super nice!  Everything she says is relevant and insightful.  She has tons of ECE class experience and it shows. If you want be great at teaching K-2 kids to read, take this class!  You will love it!

AWESOME teacher !!  She is a literacy coach in Cobb County so she is actually on the front lines every day.  She really knows her stuff !  She is SUPER nice and EVERYTHING that you do in class is relative to what you will be doing as a teacher.  Most teachers stick to textbooks, which are typically useless.  This is all about real world stuff !!
